entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 08:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
